name: Ancestor's Transformation
summary: You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix.
description:
You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix. You can cast 5th-level aerial form as a primal innate spell once per day, but you take the form of a primeval strix, using the statistics for a bird form.Traits

Strix: Winged humanoids, most of whom live in and around Cheliax.
